pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Bivariate Dependency from Marginal Data // Provides maximum likelihood methods to estimate bivariate dependency (correlation) from marginal summary statistics in multi-study settings. The package supports both binary and continuous variables assumed to follow a bivariate normal distribution, enabling privacy-preserving joint estimation when individual- level data are unavailable. The binary method is fully described in the manuscript by Shang, Tsao and Zhang (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2505.03995: "Estimating the Joint Distribution of Two Binary Variables from Their Marginal Summaries".
